name: Tilevania (Course project)
description:
'WASD' and 'SPACE' to move and jump.

My final course project for learning Unity 2D. I am proud to announce that this will be my last course based upload and I will be pursuing my own projects now! 

This is my entry based on the final part of the Unity 2D course Complete C# Unity Developer 2D: Learn to Code Making Games with Rick Davidson and Ben Tristem.

Art was purchased from the Unity Asset Store by Foxfin.

*Known issues (Game was based on tutorial content and will not be further produced or patched)

-Ladders are finicky -Coins bug out occasionally
